analysis.description: FallbackToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/44/0x6fb5b740296f712e058222c64d40f3a759ee5b32.sol#12-21) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/44/0x6fb5b740296f712e058222c64d40f3a759ee5b32.sol:
	Contract TrustaBitToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/44/0x6fb5b740296f712e058222c64d40f3a759ee5b32.sol#357-359)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in TrustaBitCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/44/0x6fb5b740296f712e058222c64d40f3a759ee5b32.sol#672-688):
